channel.title: Hits but doesnt actually hit
channel.description: Ok so I add a spec to a wep and when it hits a high number it will show the splash but wont hit. Like this. [IMG]http://i393.photobucket.com/albums/pp11/leavenow1/Hit.png[/img] How can I change this? So it actually does damage?

item.title: Hits but doesnt actually hit
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

Well it only has a problem with the spec every other weapon in the server is fine, even this without the the spec works fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Hits but doesnt actually hit
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“r r r, post:5, topic:267123”][quote author=ferasownz12 link=topic=352664.msg2704636#msg2704636 date=1236889695]
yo r r r remember me? pm me your ip i wana go on your server =p
[/quote]
Sorry but stay on topic, and yes I do remember you.

Anyway, Yeah so if it hits like a 12 it will take away HP, but if it hit like 53 in the picture it wont take away any HP[/quote]

In Player.java read through the ‘appendHitUpdate’ method to see if there is anything irregular. The problem will most likely be there. Another solution may be that you need to update the player/players appearance.

Read full topic

item.title: Hits but doesnt actually hit
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

ferasownz12:

yo r r r remember me? pm me your ip i wana go on your server =p

Sorry but stay on topic, and yes I do remember you.

Anyway, Yeah so if it hits like a 12 it will take away HP, but if it hit like 53 in the picture it wont take away any HP

Read full topic

item.title: Hits but doesnt actually hit
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:3, topic:267123”][quote author=ferasownz12 link=topic=352664.msg2704636#msg2704636 date=1236889695]
yo r r r remember me? pm me your ip i wana go on your server =p
[/quote]

Stay on topic.

@ r r r;

Could you explain this in more depth? And it is doing damage; it hits 53, unless you mean hitting on the other player.[/quote]
In the picture, he hits a 53, but it seems as if only 20% of his health is reduced.
